CustomField.formula: ccpe_r__Start_Date__c <= TODAY() && IF(ISPICKVAL(ccpe_r__Line_Item_Criteria__r.ccpe_r__Retainer__r.ccpe_r__Time_Period__c,'Week'), ( TODAY() < (ccpe_r__Start_Date__c + 7) ), IF(ISPICKVAL(ccpe_r__Line_Item_Criteria__r.ccpe_r__Retainer__r.ccpe_r__Time_Period__c,'Month'), ( MONTH(ccpe_r__Start_Date__c) == MONTH(TODAY()) && YEAR(ccpe_r__Start_Date__c) == Year(TODAY())), IF(ISPICKVAL(ccpe_r__Line_Item_Criteria__r.ccpe_r__Retainer__r.ccpe_r__Time_Period__c,'Quarter'), ( 0 <= ( MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(ccpe_r__Start_Date__c) ) && ( MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(ccpe_r__Start_Date__c) ) < 3), ISPICKVAL(ccpe_r__Line_Item_Criteria__r.ccpe_r__Retainer__r.ccpe_r__Time_Period__c,'One Time') ) ) )
CustomField.label: Is Active
